channel.title: Assembly on Raúl Negrón's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Assembly on Raúl Negrón's Website

item.title: Getting started with Game Boy development on Mac
item.description: I don’t know what inspired it, but recently I got the idea that programming for an old game console would make for a fun project. Apart from giving me an excuse to write code in a language other than Python, it’s something I’ve wanted to do ever since I learned that programming was at the heart of all the great games I’ve played throughout the years. So, I decided to find out how feasible it would be to program for one of these old school gaming systems.
